backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, appointment submissions, and prayer requests with access control and validation.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata linking feature requests to impacted frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing styles, components, and pages across the frontend codebase.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme variables and light/dark mode OKLCH color tokens applied across the app.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx with standard metadata and favicon.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots policy allowing all crawlers and pointing to sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing public site URLs with change frequency and priority.
frontend/src/App.tsx: React Router setup defining all routes and pages with a root SiteLayout wrapper.
frontend/src/components/BrandSections.ts: Two simple wrapper components, ScriptureBlock and EventHighlight, for styled section containers.
frontend/src/components/home/EventsTicke: Shows a scrolling ticker of recurring ministry events.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedEve: Displays details for a featured event with options for directions, calendar download, and online participation.
frontend/src/components/home/PrayerAndCa: Offers prayer request and emergency prayer options, including a dialog for urgent alerts.
frontend/src/components/home/ScriptureOf: Shows the daily scripture with text and reference in a styled card.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Lists key ministry services with times, details, and links to learn more.
frontend/src/components/home/UpcomingEve: Displays a grid of upcoming event cards using static event data with images and details.
frontend/src/components/LeadershipAvaila: Static availability calendar for the Chief Apostle with status legend and styled grid display.
frontend/src/components/MinistrySealsSec: Grid displaying ministry seal images with modal dialog for enlarged viewing.
frontend/src/components/PageSection.tsx: Reusable section wrapper applying background variants and spacing for layout consistency.
frontend/src/components/prayer/Emergency: Modal dialog for submitting emergency prayer requests, handling form state and async submission.
frontend/src/components/PrimaryCtas.tsx: Renders primary call‑to‑action buttons with different layouts for hero, header, and mobile variants.
frontend/src/components/SeoManager.tsx: Updates page metadata, canonical tags, and social tags based on the current route.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Displays the site footer with ministry info, service times, quick links, location details, and a credit bar.
frontend/src/components/SiteLayout.tsx: Defines the main page layout including SEO manager, navigation, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/SiteNav.tsx: Provides the site navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus, branding, and quick-access CTAs.
frontend/src/components/Typography.tsx: Exports styled typography components for titles, subtitles, and body text.
frontend/src/content/ministrySeals.ts: Exports a catalog of ministry seal and event flyer images with metadata and categories.
frontend/src/content/scriptureOfTheDay.t: Provides a rotating daily scripture selection based on day of year.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity authentication and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrayerRequests.ts: React-query hooks for submitting and fetching prayer and emergency prayer requests via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for appointment requests and user profiles, including submit, fetch, and save actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles and custom color variables for the app's branding.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AboutMinistryPage.tsx: A detailed ministry overview page presenting vision, apostolic and prophetic mandate, and mission with styled sections and images.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectPage.tsx: Provides contact details, live‑stream info, and a hero section encouraging users to connect with the ministry.
frontend/src/pages/GatheringAt6Page.tsx: Introduces the Gathering at 6 event with time, location, schedule details, and what attendees can expect.
frontend/src/pages/GetInvolvedPage.tsx: Explains service opportunities and lists ministry auxiliaries with icons and descriptions for involvement.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page featuring a hero banner, scripture displays, event components, and sections about services and care.
frontend/src/pages/KmiFellowshipPage.tsx: Describes KMI Fellowship’s vision, leadership covering, and outlines its governing colleges and assemblies.
frontend/src/pages/KmiGovernancePage.tsx: Presents KMI’s apostolic governance structure with hero styling and descriptive sections about order, oversight, and leadership roles.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipGovernanceP: Displays leadership and governance details including the presiding prelate, governance structure, and ministry leadership roles with images and icons.
frontend/src/pages/LeadershipPage.tsx: Shows leadership highlights focusing on Senior Leader Dr. Virgil Postell, including biography, ministry description, and schedule elements.
frontend/src/pages/LearningStudyPage.tsx: Provides a study resource hub with Bible translation buttons and an AI research tool for scriptural questions.
frontend/src/pages/MinistriesPage.tsx: Outlines various ministry opportunities with descriptive sections and includes a seals section and call to action.
frontend/src/pages/OurMissionPage.tsx: Defines KMI’s mission, purpose, and pillars—Connect, Empower, Extend—along with value-focused content sections.
frontend/src/pages/OutreachPage.tsx: Describes community outreach efforts, service programs, and commitment to compassionate assistance and events.
frontend/src/pages/PrayerRequestPage.tsx: Renders a prayer request form with fields, urgency selection, and submission handling, showing a confirmation screen after successful submit.
frontend/src/pages/PropheticTrainingPage: Displays information about prophetic training programs, including course details, schedule, and call-in info.
frontend/src/pages/ScheduleMeetingPage.t: Provides an authenticated appointment request form with date/time selection, request type mapping, and backend submission.
frontend/src/pages/VisitPage.tsx: Shows visitor information including what to expect, service details, and location highlights.
frontend/src/pages/WhoWeArePage.tsx: Presents organizational identity, beliefs, and purpose using structured sections and descriptions.
frontend/src/pages/WorshipServicesPage.t: Details online and in-person worship services with schedules, descriptions, and call-in information.
frontend/src/seo/routeMeta.ts: Defines route metadata with titles and descriptions and provides a helper to retrieve metadata by path with a fallback.
frontend/src/utils/publicAssetUrl.ts: Generates public asset URLs by URL‑encoding path segments and prefixing them with /assets/.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, and container settings with custom oklch-based theme variables.
project_state.json: Project state describing required fixes for ministry labels and modern imagery, along with existing and pending feature requests.
